import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { AiOutlineHeart } from "react-icons/ai"; import { Badge, Button, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' const FavoriteSong = () => { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const favoriteSongs = useSelector(state => state.music.favorite_songs) console.log(favoriteSongs) return (
My Favorite Songs

{favoriteSongs?.length}

{ favoriteSongs.slice(0, 4).map((favoriteSong) => (
{favoriteSong.title_short}
)) }
{favoriteSongs.length > 4 && ()}
Favorite Songs {favoriteSongs.map((favoriteSong) => (
{favoriteSong.title_short} {favoriteSong.artist.name}
))}
) } export default FavoriteSong
